Version 4.0.2 (2013-10-16)
	Fixed bug where compressor didn't work if the development version wasn't used.
Version 4.0.1 (2013-10-03)
	Fixed bug where it sometimes wouldn't properly init TinyMCE when loaded from cache.
Version 4.0 (2013-08-22)
	Added new rewritten compressor for TinyMCE 4.0. It's now a simple drop in replacement.
